name: ReBeat
description:
ReBeat! A rhythm/memory game for PC and mobile!  Now Available for PC, Mac, iOS, and Android! Fast Pace: 

Watch the arrows shown and listen to the beat. Then it's your turn to repeat them in time with the music!

Ramping Difficulty: 

Start out with Easy mode to get the hang of it, and unlock more modes as you get higher scores! As difficulty goes up, you will need to remember arrows on downbeats AND upbeats! Get enough points to unlock the secret Insane mode, with up to 7 arrows to remember each measure!

Features:
  • 3 original songs to choose from to play, each with different tempos
  • Unlock the secret Insane mode for even more of a challenge!
  • Audio/video calibration to ensure music and video stay in sync
